price: (Allāhu) sọ pé: “Ẹ sọ̀kalẹ̀, ọ̀tá ní apá kan yín fún apá kan. Ibùgbé àti n̄ǹkan ìgbádùn sì ń bẹ fún yín ní orí ilẹ̀ fún ìgbà (díẹ̀).”
arabic: قَالَ ٱهۡبِطُواْ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوّٞۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَرّٞ وَمَتَٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla ih'biṭū baʿḍukum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun walakum fī al-arḍi mus'taqarrun wamatāʿun ilā ḥīnin
